body:
Hi Claus,

you can use pfilt to do that. The -x and -y parameters allow to set a
target resolution. Many use them like -x /2 -y /2 to downsample, but you
can also do the opposite by setting -x /.5 -y /.5 and achieve upsampling.

Cheers, Lars.
